Great up! How do I display swedish subtitles? I use Media Player Classic - Home Cinema. The only subtitle I can choose is english.

Thanks to "FatFreddy69" for such a nice torrent. 5 stars!!! Thanks for the "mkvmerge" tool for muxing the audio and video. After downloading your torrent, I was shocked to see the audio not working for Prince Caspian, but after getting the tool in your comments section, I was relieved and things worked out nice!!! Really good quality.  5 stars for you!! :)
